name: Craft 3
description: A sample app + starterkit for deploying Craft 3 to Heroku.

ENVIRONMENT.description: The Craft environment for this app.

DB_SCHEMA.description: The database schema for this app.

CRAFT_LICENSE_KEY.description: The contents of your Craft license key file. Preserve newlines!

SECURITY_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

CRAFT_STORAGE_PATH.description: Where we should store Craft runtime artifacts. Must be writable by the Heroku web process, and assumed ephemeral. This is not a place to permanently store uploaded files.

MAILER_FROM_ADDRESS.description: The email address your application will use as the default sender.

PRIMARY_SITE_URL.description: The URL of your primary Craft CMS site. This is used to generate URLs for email verification, password reset, etc.
